thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Will return
thread.title_full: Will return - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mikael H
title: Will return
text:
Friendly staff, spacious room, decent breakfast and close to the subway.
We had nothing to complain about when visiting in January. The room was clean and bathroom didn't have any faults. The bed was comfortable and the room temperature fine.
Had a package sent to the hotel before arriving, and the package was waiting for me when we arrived.
We would definitely use the hotel again
